value.title: PiG Plays Adept Pressure PvZ - Newbie Stream
value.excerpt: This is a highlight from my newbie/beginner stream where I play a PvZ adept opening, focusing on having a clear and simple build order with pressure built in to stop a zergs economy getting out of control. I also talk about learning how to win in the early and midgame stages off an opening before moving
